title: Ticket #5457: HTCondor View: Do 12:00 AM- 12:59 AM work?
description: When entering date/time ranges, you can specify times. I suspect I get the calculation wrong for midnight up to but excluding 1:00AM, erroneously treating it as noon to 1:00PM. Investigate. Fix if busted.
remarks:
2015-Dec-29 15:14:09 by adesmet:
All cases where the hour was 12 were borked. Fixed.
creator: adesmet
